location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 64 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Muscat to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication (No 1019) dated 23 September 1824. In response, it states that the Resident at Bussora [Basra] has been informed that he has been made subordinate to the Bushire Residency in some of his duties.
